mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(NP_NO,-4)),0)+1 AS NP_NO FROM NONPROGRAM
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NONPROGRAM( NP_NO, NP_TITLE, NP_CONTENTS, NP_CENTER, NP_IMAGE, NP_RSDATE, NP_REDATE, NP_PSDATE, NP_PEDATE, NP_OBJECT, NP_PERSONNEL, TT_NO, NP_IO, ACODE, np_Deleteyn, NP_INSERTDATE, NP_UPDATEDATE, NP_FILE) VALUES( #{npNo}, #{npTitle}, #{npContents}, #{npCenter}, #{npImage}, #{npRsdate}, #{npRedate}, #{npPsdate}, #{npPedate}, #{npObject}, #{npPersonnel}, #{ttNo}, #{npIo}, #{acode}, 'Y', SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{npFile} )
mapper.select: SELECT NP_NO, NP_TITLE, NP_CONTENTS, NP_CENTER, NP_IMAGE, NP_RSDATE, NP_REDATE, NP_PSDATE, NP_PEDATE, NP_OBJECT, NP_PERSONNEL, A.TT_NO, (SELECT TT_NAME FROM T_MEMBER WHERE TT_NO=A.TT_NO) TT_NAME, NP_IO, ACODE, NP_FILE FROM NONPROGRAM A WHERE NP_NO=#{npNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE NONPROGRAM SET NP_TITLE=#{npTitle}, NP_CONTENTS=#{npContents}, NP_CENTER=#{npCenter}, NP_IMAGE=#{npImage}, NP_RSDATE=#{npRsdate}, NP_REDATE=#{npRedate}, NP_PSDATE=#{npPsdate}, NP_PEDATE=#{npPedate}, NP_OBJECT=#{npObject}, NP_PERSONNEL=#{npPersonnel}, NP_IO=#{npIo}, ACODE=#{acode}, NP_UPDATEDATE=SYSDATE WHERE NP_NO=#{npNo}
UPDATE NONPROGRAM SET NP_DELETEYN = 'N', NP_UPDATEDATE=SYSDATE WHERE NP_NO=#{npNo}
